arStrings.szText: The duration of {c_important}Grizzly Rage{/c} is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} seconds. In addition, Critical Strikes while {c_important}Grizzly Rage{/c} is active increase your Critical Strike Damage by {c_number}[Affix_Value_2|%x|]{/c} for the duration, up to a maximum of {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%x|]{/c}.
